item.title: debugger usage
item.description: It is possible to create a specific configuration of debugger settings for each project in order to debug on vscode and so launch different files. Furthermore, while you are in the debug section, VSCode provides a tool that allows you to generate a specific configuration based on the framework or functionality that you are attempting to use via a template. Using this procedure, a file called launch.json will be created within the project’s directory: .

item.title: Testing framework
item.description: After installing the Python extension, a new feature appears within VSCode: the ability to run tests through an interface with Python. To use this feature, open the Command Palette and select Python: Configure Tests. From the list of test frameworks that will be displayed, choose your preferred framework (say pytest).
